messages.content: Write me a short song about eddie vedder i can use in a grunge tribute band song

Verse 1:
Eddie Vedder, he's the one and only
He's the voice of the generation
He's the man and he's gonna show you
What real music is meant to be

Chorus:
Hey, Eddie Vedder
You're the best there's ever been
Your voice is like a lion's roar
It's gonna echo through the years

Verse 2:
He's been with us all these years
He's helped us through our tears
He's gonna keep on rockin'
Till it's all over, and it's clear

Chorus:
Hey, Eddie Vedder
You're the best there's ever been
Your voice is like a lion's roar
It's gonna echo through the years

Bridge:
And if you listen close
You can hear his soul
It's in every song he sings
And it'll never ever let you go

Chorus:
Hey, Eddie Vedder
You're the best there's ever been
Your voice is like a lion's roar
It's gonna echo through the years
do that again but make it shorter and angrier in tone

And it'll never ever let you go

Chorus:

You're the best there's ever been
Your voice is like a lion's roar
It's gonna echo through the years

End:
Hey, Eddie Vedder
You're the best there's ever been
Your voice is like a lion's roar
It's gonna echo through the years
And it'll never ever let you go!
please add in guitar chords so i can play the song
